text: Start the day with a cup of coffee and check emails.
Join the daily stand-up meeting to discuss progress and blockers.
Review code from team members on GitHub and provide feedback.
Work on the implementation of a new feature: User Authentication.
Debug an issue in the production system reported by QA.
Lunch break. Take a walk to clear the mind.
Attend a meeting with the product team to discuss the next sprint tasks.
Continue working on the feature and write unit tests.
Deploy a hotfix for an urgent bug identified in production.
Document the work done on the internal wiki for future reference.
Wrap up the day by planning tasks for tomorrow and shutting down.
